data.text:
Agarwal Packers and Movers Pragathi Nagar

Pragathi Nagar is a residential colony in Kukatpally, Hyderabad, India. It is a residential suburb in Kukatpally and is situated at a distance of around 3.4 kilometers from the Kukatpally locality on National Highway 9 which leads to the city of Mumbai. It is situated around 2 and a half kilometers from the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad.

Pragathi Nagar is located east of National Highway 9. It has an average elevation of 33 meters (108 ft) and is situated on the plains. Pragathi Nagar is located around 3 miles (4.8 km) to the west of the National Highway 9 in Nizampet. Summers are lengthy and humid. The average January temperature is about 35 Â°C, July is 38 Â°C.

Climate

Here the wet season is oppressive and overcast, the season is usually clear, and it's hot year-round. Over the year, the temperature typically varies from 61Â°F to 102Â°F and is rarely below 55Â°F or above 107Â°F. The hot season lasts for two .1 months, from March 31 to Jefferson Davis' Birthday, with a mean daily heat above 98Â°F. The hottest day of the year is May 13, with a mean high of 102Â°F and a coffee of 81Â°F. The cool season lasts for 3.4 months, from October 19 to January 30, with a mean daily heat below 86Â°F. The coldest day of the year is December 22, with a mean low of 61Â°F and a high of 82Â°F.

How to Reach

By Air

The closest Passenger airport is Rajiv Gandhi International Airport at a distance of 44 min (39.1 km) via Nehru Outer Ring Rd. You can take a cab or bus to the airport. The fact that this place can be reached by airplane is a really good thing as people can travel and come from miles away to visit this place.

By Rail

Being part of Greater Hyderabad and its strategic geographical location with proximity being close to major IT/ITES, Biotech, Pharma industries, etc., residents of Pragathi Nagar will have easy access to the Hyderabad Metro Rail project. Access to Metro Rail will help residents to reach the other end of the greater Hyderabad in less than one hour. The Railways play an important part in binding this place to the neighboring places as the trains pass through this pace and travel to the neighboring places as well.

By Road

Basic transportation is served and is provided by the state government undertaking, department of the public transportation agency, TSRTC.

Pragathi Nagar is well connected to the neighboring localities by the roadways. Overall itâs well connected by the neighboring cities through its roadways. As buses, motorbikes and cars can pass through this place easily because of the condition of the road.

Closest Branch

The closest branch is situated at a distance of 34 min (14.1 km) via NH65 and NH 44. You can take a cab or an auto to reach faster. The distance from this place to the nearest branch makes it easier to travel and reach the place faster in an easier way.
